Title: Relates to attacks on service dogs
Summary: Relates to attacks on service dogs; provides for a penalty of $1000 for the attack on a service dog or user of such service dog and a fine of $2000 for an attack on both dog and user; also provides that if the attacking dog has previously been found to be a dangerous dog, then such fines shall be $2000 and $4000 respectively, and such may also be punishable with 90 days imprisonment.
LawCode: Amd ยง121, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to attacks on service dogs and their users
